You must not play a lot if you're surprised at that....

I've recently witnessed a video in which, apparently, someone flamed a Riot employee

I don't even understand the depths of seething rage someone would need to risk their account for that..

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Creepy-Condescending-Wonka.jpg

Couldn't think of anything worthwhile to put it for words, so hopefully the blank "Condescending Wonka" meme won't seem too... well... condescending.
Riot members still replying to memes and games instead of fixing the game.
How dare someone being doing something unproductive at about 3:30 on a friday....I was home by noon today.

Its not that strange that people rage on Riot after all, alot of people (me included) feel like they completly ruined the game this season.
I dont see any strategy left except for jumping in and get vaporized by aoe and cc or run away into your base and hide and be called an afker by raging teens. 
Id rather see a game where you have atleast some time to think about a move or counter play rather poof Im dead or I got poked in lane by 1 spell so I better go back before that cd is up again and I die. Oh wait i just fell far behind now... gameover!
The damages are so overtuned Im concidering quit playing if that doesnt change soon.
